juzs.text: “۞ Kodi akufunsana zachiyani
“Za nkhani yayikulu ija
“Imene iwo akusiyana (maganizo)
“Aleke (zimenezo) adzadziwa posachedwapa
“Ayi, ndithu aleke (zimenezo); posachedwapa adzadziwa zoona zake (pamene chilango chidzawatsikira)
“Kodi sitidachite nthaka kukhala ngati choyala
“Ndi mapiri ngati zichiri (zolimbitsa nthaka)
“Ndipo takulengani mitundu iwiri (amuna ndi akazi)
“Ndipo tidachita tulo tanu kukhala mpumulo (ku mavuto a ntchito)
“Ndipo taupanga usiku kukhala ngati chovala (pokuvindikirani ndi mdima wake)
“Ndipo tapanga masana kukhala nthawi yopezera zofunika pa moyo
“Ndipo tamanga pamwamba panu thambo zisanu ndi ziwiri zolimba
“Ndipo tidapanga nyali yowala ndi yotentha kwambiri (dzuwa)
“Ndipo tawatsitsa madzi otsika mwamphamvu kuchokera ku mitambo, ya mvula
“Kuti titulutse ndi madziwo mbewu ndi m’mera, (chomwe ndi chakudya cha anthu ndi nyama)
“Ndi minda yothothana nthambi za mitengo
“Ndithu tsiku la chiweruziro ndinthawi imene idakhazikitsidwa kale
“Tsiku limene lipenga (lakuuka) lidzaimbidwa ndipo inu mudzabwera (kubwalo losonkhanirana) muli magulumagulu
“Ndipo thambo lidzatsegulidwa (mbali zonse): choncho lidzakhala makomomakomo
“Ndipo mapiri adzachotsedwa m’malo mwake, adzakhala ngati zideruderu
“Ndithu moto wa Jahannam ukuwadikilira (oipa)
“Mbuto ya opyola malire
“Adzakhala m’menemo muyaya
“Sadzalawa m’menemo kuzizira (kowachotsera kutentha), kapena chakumwa (chowachotsera ludzu lawo)
“Kupatula madzi otentha kwambiri ndi mafinya (otuluka mmatupi a anthu a ku Moto)
“Kukhala malipiro olingana ndi ntchito zawo
“Ndithu iwo sadali kuyembekezera chiwerengero (cha Allah)
“Adatsutsa zizindikiro Zathu (zosonyeza kuuka kwa akufa) ndi mtsutso waukulu
“Ndipo chinthu chilichonse tachisunga mochilemba
“Basi, lawani (lero chilango Changa); sitikuonjezerani chinthu china koma chilango pamwamba pa chilango
“Ndithu anthu oopa Allah adzakhala ndi malo wopambana
“Minda ndi zipatso za mphesa
“Ndi mabuthu (anamwali) ofanana misinkhu
“Ndi zipanda zodzaza ndi zakumwa
“Sakamva m’menemo mawu opanda pake kapena bodza
“Amenewa ndi malipiro ochokera kwa Mbuye wako zopereka zokwanira
“Mbuye wa kumwamba ndi pansi ndi zimene zili pakati pake; Wachifundo chambiri. Palibe amene adzakhala ndi mphamvu yolankhulana naye (pa tsiku limenero)

“Tsiku limene adzaima Jibril ndi angelo pa mzere (ali odzichepetsa); sadzayankhula aliyense mwa iwo kupatula yekhayo amene adzaloledwa ndi (Allah) Wachifundo chambiri (kuyankhula) ndipo adzanena zolondola
“Limenelo ndi tsiku loona, (lopanda chikaiko); choncho amene akufuna adzipezere malo (njira yonkera) kwa Mbuye wake. (Pomugonjera Iye pa moyo uno wadziko lapansi)

“Ndithu tikukuchenjezani zachilango chomwe chili pafupi kudza; tsiku limene munthu adzayang’ana zimene adatsogoza manja ake, ndipo wosakhulupirira adzanena: Kalanga ine! Ndikadakhala dothi, (kuti ndisalangidwe chilango chikundiyembekezachi)
“Ndikulumbilira (angelo) amene amazula mwamphamvu (mizimu ya osakhulupirira)
“Ndikulumbiliranso (angelo) amene amachotsa moleza (mizimu ya okhulupirira)
“Ndi omwe amasambira (nayo mizimuyo) mu mlengalenga (ponka nayo ku malo ake oyembekezera)
“Ndi iwo amene akupikisana pokwaniritsa malamulo a Allah
“Ndi iwo (angelo) amene akulongosola malamulo (Ake). (Ndithudi inu anthu mudzauka kwa akufa)
“Patsiku lomwe (lipenga loyamba lidzaimbidwa), dziko lapansi ndi mapiri ake zidzagwedezeka (ndipo aliyense adzafa)
“Ndipo kudzatsatira kuyimba kwa lipenga lachiwiri (kumene kudzaukitsa akufa onse)
“Tsiku limenelo mitima idzanjenjemera ndi kuopa
“Maso a eni mitimayo adzakhala ozyolika (chifukwa chamadandaulo)
“(Osakhulupirira) akunena: “Kodi nzoona tidzabwezedwa pambuyo pa imfa monga tidalili kale?”
““Pomwe ife titakhala mafupa ofumbwa (tingabwezedwe ndi kuukitsidwa mwa tsopano)?”
“Adanena (mokanira ndi mwachipongwe): “Choncho kubwerera kumeneko ngati kudzakhalepodi kudzakhala kotaika (ndi kopanda phindu kwa ife. Pomwe ife sindife oyenera kutaika).”
“(Musaganize kubwererako nchinthu chovuta). Ndithundithu Kiyamayo ndi nkuwo umodzi
“Mwadzidzidzi (zolengedwa zonse) zidzangoona zili pa dziko latsopano (zili zamoyo)
“Kodi yakufika (iwe Mtumiki) (s.a.w) nkhani ya Mûsa
“Pamene Mbuye wake adamuitana pa chigwa choyera (chotchedwa) Tuwaa
“(Adamuuza kuti) pita kwa Farawo ndithu iye wapyola malire, (mkudzitukumula kwake ndikupondereza anthu)
“Choncho ukamuuze kuti: “Kodi ukufuna kudziyeretsa?”
““Ndikuti ndikuongolere kwa Mbuye wako kuti uzimuopa?”
“(Basi Mûsa) adamuonetsa (Farawo) chozizwitsa chachikulu
“Koma (Farawo) adatsutsa (Mûsa pazimene adadza nazo zija) ndi kunyoza
“Kenaka adabwerera uku akulimbika kutsutsana naye (Allah)
“Adawasonkhanitsa (afiti) uku akuitana anthu
“Nanena: “Ine ndine mbuye wanu wapamwambamwamba!”
“Pamenepo Allah adamulanga chifukwa cha mawu ake omaliza ndi oyamba
“Ndithu pa zimenezi pali phunziro (lalikulu) kwa yemwe akuopa Allah
“Kodi kulengedwa kwanu, (inu osakhulupirira kuti muuke) nkovuta kapena thambo limene adalimanga (posonkhanitsa mbali zake zosiyanasiyana ndikukhala chinthu chimodzi)
“Adatukula nsinkhu wake ndikulikonza bwino (popanda pena pong’ambika kapena posiyana ndi pena)
“Ndipo amauvindikira usiku wake ndi mdima ndipo amatulutsa kuwala wake
“Ndipo pambuyo pazimenezo, nthaka adaiyala (kuti ikhale yoyenera kuikhala)
“Adatulutsa m’menemo madzi ake (potulutsa akasupe) ndikumeretsa msipu wake
“Ndipo mapiri adawakhazikitsa (ndikuwalimbika)
“(Adachita zonsezi) chifukwa chokusangalatsani inu ndi ziweto zanu
“Choncho likadzafika tsoka lalikulu (tsiku la Qiyâma)
“Tsiku limenelo munthu adzakumbukira zimene adachita, (zabwino ndi zoipa)
“Ndipo Moto waukali udzawonetsedwa kwa yense openya
“Tsono amene adapyola malire (pochita machimo)
“Ndikudzisankhira (yekha) moyo wa pa dziko lapansi
“Ndithu Jahannam ndiwo malo ake
“Tsono amene akuopa kuti adzaimilira pamaso pa Mbuye wake, nauletsa mtima wake ku zilakolako zoipa
“Ndithu Munda wamtendere ndiwo adzakhale malo ake
“Akukufunsa (iwe Mtumiki) (s.a.w) za nthawi (ya tsiku lachimaliziro kuti): “Idzakhala liti?”
“Uli ndi mphamvu yanji iwe yofotokozera za tsikulo? (Iwe ulibe kuzindikira za nthawiyo kotero kuti ungaitchule kwa iwo)
“Kwa Mbuye wako ndiko kuli mathero ake
“Iwe (ntchito yako) ndikuwachenjeza amene akuiopa; (osati kulengeza zanthawi yake)
“Tsiku limene adzaiona adzakhala ngati sadakhale (pa dziko nthawi yayitali), koma ngati madzulo amodzi kapena masana ake (nthawi ya m’mawa)
“Adachita tsinya (Mneneri) ndi kuyang’ana kumbali
“Chifukwa chakuti adamdzera wakhungu (kudzamfunsa zokhudzana ndi chipembedzo chake pamene iye adali kuyankhula ndi atsogoleri Achiquraishi)
“Nanga chingakudziwitse nchiyani kuti mwina iye angadziyeretse (pomvera ulaliki wako watsopano)
“Kapena akumbukira, ndipo kukumbukirako kumthandiza
“Koma amene wadzikwaniritsa (ndi chuma chake ndi mphamvu zake)
“Ameneyo ndi yemwe ukumchitira chidwi
“Palibe chilichonse pa iwe ngati sadziyeretsa
“Koma amene wakudzera uku akuthamanga (kufuna maphunziro ndi chiongoko)
“Ndipo iye akuopa (Allah mu mtima mwake)
“Za iye, iwe sukusamala, (ukuyikira chidwi kwa wina)
“Sichoncho! Ndithudi iyi (Qur’an) ndi chikumbutso (chenjezo)
“Basi, amene wafuna alangizika (ndi Qur’an, ndipo amene sakufuna msiye)
“(Malangizowa akuchokera) mmakalata olemekezeka (kwa Allah)
“Apamwamba ndiponso oyeretsedwa (kumbiri iliyonse yopunguka)
“Omwe ali m’manja mwa Alembi (Angelo)
“Olemekezeka, omvera
“Waonongeka (watembeleredwa) munthu. Nkotani kusayamika kwake kotereku
“Kuchokera mchinthu chanji chimene iye adamulenga
“Kuchokera ku dontho lamadzi (onyozeka) adamulenga, namkonzeratu mkalengedwe kosiyanasiyana
“Kenako adamfewetsera njira (yotulukira m’mimba mwa mai ake)
“Ndipo amamchititsa kuti amwalire namukumbula m’manda
“Kenako akadzafuna adzamuukitsa (pambuyo pa imfa)
“Ayi ndithu (munthu) sanakwaniritsebe zimene adamulamula Mbuye wake (Allah chingakhale wakhala nthawi yaitali pa dziko lapansi)
“Alingalire munthu (mmene chilili) chakudya chake
“Ndithu Ife timagwetsa mvula yambiri (kuchokera ku mitambo)
“Kenako timaing’amba nthaka kuti mmera utuluke
“Ndipo timameretsa m’menemo njere (ya chakudya cha anthu ndi zina zimene amasunga mnkhokwe)
“Ndi mphesa ndi msipu
“Ndi mzitona (wabwino) ndi (zipatso za) kanjedza
“Ndi minda yothothana nthambi za mitengo
“Ndi zipatso (zodyedwa ndi anthu) ndi msipu (wodyedwa ndi nyama)
“(Tazimeretsa zimenezo kuti) zikondweretse inu ndi ziweto zanu
“Choncho likadzafika lipenga logonthetsa mkhutu (ndi kuumitsa makosi)
“Patsikuli munthu adzathawa m’bale wake
“Mayi wake ndi bambo wake
“Mkazi wake ndi ana ake
“Munthu aliyense mwa iwo, tsiku limenelo adzakhala ndi zakezake zotangwanika nazo. (Sadzalabadira za anzake)
“Tsiku limenelo nkhope zina zidzakhala zowala
“Zosekelera ndi zachimwemwe (chifukwa cha nkhani yabwino ya ku Munda wamtendere)
“Ndipo nkhope zina tsiku limenelo zidzakhala zokutidwa ndi fumbi
“Mdima udzazikuta
“Iwo ndi anthu osakhulupirira oipa (olakwira Allah)
“Pamene dzuwa lidzakulungidwe (ndikuchotsedwa kuwala kwake)
“Ndi pamene nyenyezi zidzathothoke (ndi kuchoka dangalira lake)
“Ndi pamene mapiri adzayendetsedwe (kuchoka mmalo mwake)
“Ndi pamene ngamira zabere lamiyezi khumi zidzasiidwe (zopanda oziyang’anira)
“Ndi pamene nyama za mtchire zidzasonkhanitsidwe pamodzi (kuchokera mmalo osiyanasiyana chifukwa chakuopsa kwakukulu kwa tsikulo)
“Ndi pamene nyanja zidzayatsidwe moto
“Ndi pamene mizimu idzalumikizidwe (ndi matupi ake)
“Ndi pamene mwana wamkazi yemwe adaikidwa m’manda wamoyo adzafunsidwe
“Ndi tchimo lanji adaphedwera
“Ndi pamene makalata (momwe mudalembedwa zochita za aliyense) adzatambasulidwe ndi kugawidwa (kuti awerengedwe)
“Ndi pamene thambo lidzayalulidwe (kuchoka mmalo mwake)
“Ndi pamene Jahena idzasonkhezeredwe mwamphamvu
“Ndi pamene Jannah idzayandikitsidwe
“(Zikadzachitika zimenezi) mzimu uliwonse udzadziwa zimene wabweretsa (zabwino ndi zoipa)
“Ndikulumbilira nyenyezi zimene zimabwerera masana ndi kutulukanso usiku
“Zomwe zimayenda kenako nkubisika
“Ndi usiku pamene ukulowa
“Ndi m’mawa kukamacha
“Ndithu iyi (Qur’an) ndi liwu la mthenga wa Allah (Jibril) wolemekezeka
“Mwini mphamvu ndi mwini ulemelero kwa Mwini Arsh (Mpando wa chifumu)
“Womveredwa kumeneko ndiponso wokhulupirika (pachivumbulutso)
“Ndipo m’bale wanuyu siwamisala ayi
“Ndithu ndikulumbira kuti (iye Mtumiki) (s.a.w) adamuona (Jibril) mchizimezime (chakum’mawa) chooneka bwino
“Ndipo sali iye (Mtumiki) waumbombo ndi chivumbulutso (koma amafikitsa zonse ndi kuziphunzitsa kwa anthu)
“(Chivumbulutso chomwe chavumbulutsidwachi kwa iye) si mawu a satana wothamangitsidwa (mchifundo cha Allah)
“Nanga mukupita kuti
“(Qur’ani) iyi sichina koma ndi chikumbutso cha zolengedwa zonse
“Kwa yemwe mwa inu akufuna kuyenda mu njira yoongoka
“Ndipo simungafune chinthu mwa inu nokha pokhapokha atafuna Allah Mbuye wa zolengedwa zonse
“Pamene thambo lidzasweke
“Ndi pamene nyenyezi zidzayoyoke (ndi kumwazikana)
“Pamenenso nyanja zikuluzikulu zidzaphwasulidwe
“Ndiponso pamene manda adzafukulidwe (ndikutuluka akufa omwe adali mmenemo)
“(Panthawiyo) mzimu uliwonse udzadziwa zimene udatsogoza (zabwino ndi zoipa) ndi zimene udasiya m’mbuyo
“E iwe munthu! Nchiani chakunyenga kumsiya Mbuye wako wa ufulu (kufikira pomnyoza)
“Amene adalenga iwe nakulinganiza (ziwalo zako) ndi kukulongosola (moyenera)
“Ndipo maonekedwe amtundu uliwonse omwe adawafuna adakuveka (popanda chifuniro chako)
“Ayi, sichoncho! Koma inu mukutsutsa za (tsiku) lamalipiro
“Ndithu pa inu alipo okuyang’ anirani
“Olemekezeka, olemba (zochita zanu)
“Akudziwa (zonse) zimene mukuchita (zabwino ndi zoipa)
“Ndithudi ochita zabwino adzakhala mu mtendere
“Ndipo ndithu amene ali olakwira malamulo a Allah adzakhala ku Moto wopsereza
“Adzaulowa tsiku la malipiro
“Ndipo iwo kumeneko sadzachokako
“Kodi nchiyani chingakudziwitse za tsiku la malipiro
“Ndipo nchiyani chingakudziwitse za tsiku lamalipiro
“Limeneli ndi tsiku limene mzimu uliwonse sudzakhala ndi mphamvu (yodzetsa mtendere kapena yochotsa chovuta) pa mzimu wina. Ndipo lamulo pa tsiku limeneli ndi la Allah yekha
“Kuonongeka koopsa kukawapeza opunguza miyeso ya malonda
“Amene amati akamadziyezera zinthu kwa anthu amafuna kulandira miyeso yodzadza
“Koma pamene iwo akamawayesera pa muyeso wa mbale kapena wa sikelo amapungula (choyenera kulandira ogulawo)
“Kodi amenewa (akupungula miyeso pamalondawo) sakuganiza kuti adzaukitsidwa
“Pa tsiku lalikulu (ndiponso loopsa)
“Tsiku limene adzaimilira anthu pamaso pa Mbuye wa zolengedwa
“Ayi! Ndithu (siyani chinyengo pamalonda ndi kusalabadira kuuka mmanda); zolembedwa za ntchito ya oipa zili mu Sijjin
“Nanga nchiyani chitakudziwitse za Sijjin
“Ameneyu ndi kaundula wamkulu yemwe walembedwa (mkati mwake ntchito za anthu oipa)
“Chilango chaukali tsiku limenelo chili pa otsutsa
“Amene akutsutsa za tsiku la malipiro
“Ndipo palibe angalitsutse koma yekhayo wopyola malire (pochita zoipa), wa machimo ambiri
“Pamene ma Ayah Athu akuwerengedwa kwa iye (onena za tsiku la malipiro ndikuuka mmanda) amanena kuti: “Izi ndi nthano za anthu akale.”
“Iyayi, sichoncho! Koma yaphimbidwa mitima yawo ndi dzimbiri (la machimo) omwe akhala akukolola
“Ayi ndithu iwo (okanira) tsiku limenelo) adzatchingidwa kwa Mbuye wawo; (sadzamuona)
“Pambuyo pake adzalowa ku Moto; (oyaka)
“Kenaka adzauzidwa (powaliritsa) “Ichi nchilango chomwe mudali kuchitsutsa (pa dziko lapansi).”
“Zoona, ndithu kaundula wa anthu abwino (ochita ntchito zabwino) ali mu Illiyyun
“Nanga nchiyani chitakudziwitse za Illiyyun
“Ameneyu ndi kaundula (wamkulu) yemwe walembedwa (mkati mwake ntchito za anthu abwino)
“Amamuyikira umboni (angelo) amene ayandikitsidwa (kwa Allah)
“Ndithu ochita zabwino adzakhala mu mtendere
“Atakhala pa mipando ya ulemu uku akuyang’ana (zimene Allah wawapatsa monga mtendere ndi ulemelero)
“Udzaona kuwala kwa mtendere pa nkhope zawo
“Adzamwetsedwa vinyo (woyeretsedwa) wotsekeredwa ndi zitsekerero zolimba
“Komalizira kwake (kwa vinyoyo) kuzikatuluka fungo la misk; kuti akapeze zimenezi, apikisane opikisana
“Ndipo chosakanizira cha vinyoyo ndi madzi a Tasnim
“(Tasnim ameneyo) ndi kasupe amene azikamwa amene ayandikitsidwa (kwa Allah)
“Ndithu amene adachita machimo adali kuwaseka (mwachipongwe) okhulupirira (pa dziko lapansi)
“(Okhulupirira) akadutsa pafupi ndi iwo ankakodolerana maso (mwachipongwe)
“Ndipo akabwerera kwa anzawo amabwerera akusangalala (ndi kunyozedwa kwa okhulupirira)
“Ndipo (nthawi zonse) akawaona Asilamu amanena: “Ndithu awa ndi osokera (chifukwa chomkhulupirira Mtumiki).” (s.a.w)
“Sanatumizidwe (Akafiri) kukhala ayang’aniri kwa okhulupirira (ndikuwaweruza zakulungama ndi kusokera)
“Basi lero okhulupirira awaseka osakhulupirira (powabwezera chipongwe chawo chimene ankachita pa dziko lapansi)
“Atakhala pa mipando ya ulemu uku akuyang’ana (mtendere umene Allah wawapatsa)
“Kodi alipidwa osakhulupirira pa zomwe ankachita zija (pa dziko lapansi)
Pamene thambo lidzang’ambike (kusonyeza mapeto ake)
“Ndikudzamvera lamulo la Mbuye wake; ndipo lidzayenera kutero
“Ndiponso pamene nthaka idzatambasulidwe (pogumuka mapiri ake ndikuchoka zitunda zake)
“Ndi kutaya zomwe zidali mkati mwake ndi kukhala yopanda kanthu
“Ndikudzamvera lamulo la Mbuye wake; ndipo lidzayenera kutero. (Choncho zikadzachitika zimenezi ndiye kuti munthu adzalandira mphoto ya zochita zake)
“E iwe munthu! Ndithudi iwe ukubwerera kwa Mbuye wako (ndi zochita zako zabwino kapena zoipa), kubwerera kotsimikizika, ndipo iwe ukumana (ndi zotsatira za zochitachita zako)
“Tsono amene adzapatsidwe kaundula wa zochita zake kudzanja la manja
“Basi iye, adzawerengedwa, kuwerengedwa kopepuka
“Ndipo adzabwerera kwa anthu ake (okhulupirira) ali wokondwa
“Koma yemwe adzapatsidwe kaundula wa zochita zake chakumanzere kudzera kumbuyo kwa msana wake (chifukwa chomunyoza)
“Basi, iye adzaitana imfa (kuti imufikire; kuti afe apumule, koma siidzamufikira)
“Ndipo adzalowa ku Moto woyaka
“Kamba kakuti iye adali wokondwa; (kukondwa kwa machimo) pamodzi ndi anthu ake (osaganizira za mathero ake)
“Ndithudi, amaganiza kuti sadzabwerera (kwa Allah ndiponso sadzawerengedwa)
“Chifukwa ninji (asabwelere)? Ndithu Mbuye wake adali kumuona. (Choncho alipidwa zimene adachita)
“Choncho ndikulumbilira kufiira kwa dzuwa (pamene likulowa)
“Ndi usiku ndi zimene wasonkhanitsa
“Ndi mwezi ukakwanira dangalira (lake)
“Ndithudi mudzachoka apa kunka apa (pa moyo uno mpakana umene uli nkudza)
“Kodi nchiyani chikuwaletsa iwo (okanira) kukhulupirira (Allah ndi kuuka kumanda, zisonyezo zake zitaonekera poyera)
“Ndipo ikawerengedwa kwa iwo Qur’an, sagwetsa pansi nkhope zawo (modzichepetsa)
“Koma amene sadakhulupirire akutsutsa basi (chifukwa cha makani ndi kudzikweza)
“Ndipo Allah akudziwa (bwinobwino) zimene akuzisonkhanitsa
“Choncho, auze nkhani yachilango chopweteka
“Kupatula awo amene akhulupirira ndikuchita ntchito zabwino, kwa iwo kuli malipiro osatha
“Ndikulumbilira thambo lomwe liri ndi Buruj (Nyenyezi zikuluzikulu)
“Ndi tsiku lolonjezedwa (kuwerengedwa ndi kulipidwa)
“Ndi woikira umboni, ndi woikiridwa umboni
“Atembeleredwa eni ngalande zamoto (zomwe adali kuwazunzira okhulupirira Allah, achimuna ndi achikazi)
“(Ngalande) za moto wankhuni (zambiri zomwe adali kuzikoleza ndikuotchera okhulupirira)
“Pamene iwo adali chikhalire m’mphepete mwa ngalandezo
“Uku iwo akuyang’ana zomwe amawachitira okhulupirira, (pootchedwa ndi moto)
“Sadaone choipa chilichonse mwa iwo koma chifukwa choti adakhulupirira Allah mwini mphamvu zonse ndiponso mwini kuyamikidwa
“Yemwe ufumu wakumwamba ndi pansi ndiWake; ndipo Allah ndi mboni pachilichonse

“Ndithu amene ayesa mayeso okhulupirira achimuna ndi achikazi (pa chipembedzo chawo ndi mazunzo ndi chilango cha moto), pambuyo pake osalapa (pa zimenezi), adzalandira chilango cha Jahena ndiponso chilango cha moto wopsereza

“Ndipo yemwe muyeso wake (wa zinthu zabwino) udzapepuka (ndi kulemera zoipa)
“Ndiye kuti mbuto yake ndi ku Hawiya
“Kodi ndi chiyani chingakudziwitse za Hawiya
“Umenewo ndi Moto woyaka mwa ukali
“Kwakutangwanitsani kusonkhanitsa (chuma chambiri ndi ana)
“Mpakana mwapita kumanda (mwamwalira ndikukalowa m’manda)
“Sichoncho! Mudziwa posachedwapa
“Ndiponso sichoncho! Mudziwa posachedwapa
“Sichoncho! mukadakhala mukudziwa, kudziwa kwachitsimikizo (sibwenzi mukutangwanika ndi za mdziko)
“Ndithudi mudzauona Moto
“Kenako mudzauona ndithu ndi diso lachitsimikizo
“Tsono patsikulo ndithudi mudzafunsidwa za mtendere (omwe munapatsidwa)
“Ndikuilumbilira nthawi
“Ndithu munthu aliyense ndi wotaika (chifukwa chakugonjetsedwa ndi zilakolako zake)
“Kupatula amene akhulupirira (mwa Allah) ndi kumachita zabwino, ndikumalangizana kutsatira choona ndiponso ndi kumalangizana za kupirira (potsatira malamulo a Allah ndi zina za mdziko)
“Kuonongeka koopsa kudzampeza aliyense wojeda ndi wonyoza anthu polozera (ndi maso kapena kuyankhula ndi lirime)
“Yemwe wasonkhanitsa chuma ndikumachiwerengera
“Akuganiza kuti chuma chakecho chimkhazika (pa dziko) nthawi yaitali (ndikumteteza ku zimene sakuzifuna)
“Sichoncho! (Asiye maganizo amenewo) ndithudi, akaponyedwa ku Moto woononga (chifukwa cha kuipa kwa zochita zake)
“Ndi chiyani chingakudziwitse za Moto woonongawu
“Umenewu ndi Moto wa Allah woyaka (nthawi zonse, woononga chilichonse choponyedwa mmenemo)
“Umene umakwera mpaka ku mtima
“Ndithu motowo ukawazinga (ndi kuwatsekera makomo)
“Munsanamira za zitalizitali (kotero kuti sakatha kugwedezeka mmenemo kapena kupulumuka)
“Kodi sudaone momwe Mbuye wako adawachitira eni njovu
“Kodi sadachichite chiwembu chawo kukhala chosokera (chopanda phindu)
“Ndipo adawatumizira magulumagulu a mbalame otsatizana. (ndipo adawazungulira mbali zonse)
“Zimawagenda ndi miyala ya moto
“Choncho adawachita ngati m’mera wodyedwa (ndi nyama ndi kulavulidwa)
“Cholinga chakuwachita Maquraish kuti apitirize chizolowezi chawo
“Apitilize chizolowezi chawo choyenda nthawi ya dzinja (kunka ku Yemen) ndi nthawi yachirimwe (kunka ku Sham kukachita malonda, mosatekeseka ndi mopanda mantha)
“Choncho, amupembedze Mbuye wa Nyumba iyi (Al-Kaaba amene adachititsa kuti athe kuyenda maulendo awiriwo)
“Yemwe amawadyetsa (nthawi imene Arabu anzawo) ali m’njala, ndipo amawapatsa chitetezo (pomwe anzawo) ali ndi mantha
“Kodi wamuona yemwe akutsutsa za mphoto (ndi chiwerengero cha tsiku lachimaliziro)
“Iye ndi yemwe akukankha wamasiye (mwankhanza)
“Ndipo salimbikitsa (ena pamodzi ndi iye mwini) kudyetsa osauka
“Choncho kuonongeka kuli pa ena mwa opemphera swala (amene ali ndi mbiri izi)
“Omwe amachitira mphwayi mapemphero awo
“Amenenso (akamachita mapemphero awo) amadzionetsera (kwa anthu mwachipha maso kuti apeze ulemelero ndi kutamandidwa mmitima mwa anthu)
“Ndipo amamana ziwiya (zawo posabwereka anzawo zinthu zofunika pa moyo wa aliyense monga nkhwangwa, mpeni, mtondo ndi zina zotere)
“Ndithu takupatsa zabwino zambiri (zina mwa izo ndi mtsinje wotchedwa Kauthar)
“(Pakuti ndakupatsa zimenezo), pitiriza kupembedza Mbuye wako (moyera mtima) ndipo ipha nsembe yako (chifukwa chakuthokoza Allah pa zimene wakupatsa, monga ulemelero ndikukusankhira zabwino zambiri)
“Ndithu mdani wako ndiye ali wopanda mwawi
“Nena (iwe Mtumiki) (s.a.w): E inu anthu osakhulupirira
“Sindipembedza chimene inu mukuchipembedza (kusiya Allah)
“Inunso simumpembedza amene ine ndikumpembedza (yemwe ndi Allah)
“Ndiponso ine sindidzapembedza chimene inu mwakhala mukuchipembedza (chifukwa inu ndinu ophatikiza Allah ndi zinthu zina)
“Ndipo inu simudzampembedza amene ine ndikumpembedza (yemwe ndi Allah)
“Inu muli ndi chipembedzo chanu (chimene mukuchikhulupirira), inenso ndili ndi chipembedzo changa (chimene Allah wandisankhira)
“Chikafika chipulumutso cha Allah ndi kugonjetsa (mzinda wa Makka kwa iwe ndi okutsatira)
“Ndikuwaona anthu akulowa m’chipembedzo cha Allah ali magulumagulu
“Pamenepo lemekeza Mbuye wako ndi kumtamanda ndiponso mpemphe chikhululuko, ndipo ndithu Iye ndiwolandira mochuluka kulapa (kwa anthu Ake)
“Aonongeka manja a Abi Lahab (omwe adali kuwagwiritsa ntchito pozunza Asilamu). Nayenso wawonongeka
“Chuma chake ndi ulemelero wake (umene adaupeza) sizidamthandize ku chilango cha Allah
“Adzalowa ku Moto wa malawi
“Nayenso mkazi wake (adzalowa ku Moto) yemwe adali kusenza nkhuni (za minga pomutchera Mtumiki (s.a.w) komanso amanka nadanitsa pakati pa anthu
“Mkhosi mwake mdzamangidwa chingwe chopiringidwa bwino cha mlaza (chomlanga nacho)
“Nena (iwe Mtumiki (s.a.w), kwa amene akukufunsa mwachipongwe, mbiri za Mulungu wako): “Iye ndi Allah Mmodzi, (alibe mnzake)
“Allah ndi Wokhala ndi zonse Wodaliridwa ndi zolengedwa Zake
“Sadabale (mwana) ndiponso sadaberekedwe
“Ndiponso palibe aliyense wofanana ndi Iye.”
“Nena: “Ndikudzitchinjiriza ndi Mbuye wam’bandakucha
“Kuchokera ku zoipa zimene Iye adazilenga
“Ndi ku zoipa za usiku pamene mdima ukulowa mwa mphamvu
“Ndi ku zoipa za afiti omwe amauzira mu mfundo
“Ndiponso ku zoipa za wansanje pamene akuchita nsanje.”
“Nena: “Ndikudzitchinjiriza ndi Mbuye (Mleri) wa anthu (Yemwe akulinganiza zinthu zawo)
“Mfumu ya anthu ( Imene iri ndi mphamvu yochita chirichonse pa iwo)
“Wopembedzedwa wa anthu
“Kuzoipa za mnong’onezi (yemwe amathira unong’onezi wake m’mitimaya anthu) yemwenso amabisala (posiya unong’onezi wake ngati mwini mtimawo atankumbukira Allah)
“Yemwe amanong’oneza mzifuwa za anthu
“Wochokera m’ziwanda ndi mwa anthu.”
